name: Integration
description:
"zzt -- Here lies- lies an opportunity. You ha-have been sentenced to life for c--zztz- committed against The Co----zzt ---. We offer a... second ch-chance. Complete this mission and you will be... free."

Take on this over run space station and eliminate all enemies! You will have... help... along the way. But be aware life is limited and everything has a price.

Source:  https://www.dropbox.com/s/lgor94x0u9e60pf/IAmBecomeDeath.zip?dl=0
